vega.uplink.planning

Class Schedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • MapContext
      • vega.uplink.planning.Schedule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObservationListener

    public class Schedule
extends MapContext
implements ObservationListener
    An Schedule is a timeline of all spacecraft activities. It contains an Observation Schedule but also a PTSL with the maintenance activities and a PDFM to be able to decode the PTR
